#summary Operators are part of the AntiCultureWorld project.

*Operators* use [Entity entities] to destroy or spawn [Entity entities] while altering [NeedStat needs]. An operator is similar to a verb in human language or a predicate in formal language.

==List of Operators==

===Basic operators===
  * Consume
  * Urinate
  * Defecate
  * [Copulate]
  * Vomit
  * Sleep

===Physical operators===
  * Go
  * Hit
  * Push
  * Strike

===Communicative operators===
  * ShareKnowledge
  * CriticizeKnowledge
  * CommentAction
  * Write
  * Read
